# rpc-body-limit

command
```bash
go run server/main.go
```

```bash
go run client/main.go
```

server log
```bash
Server is running on localhost 7878
Received request: POST /health
Content-Length: 5241880
Headers: map[Accept-Encoding:[gzip] Content-Length:[5241880] Content-Type:[application/json] User-Agent:[Go-http-client/1.1]]
Body: ... (truncated)
Health check requested
Received request: POST /health
Content-Length: 5243880
Headers: map[Accept-Encoding:[gzip] Content-Length:[5243880] Content-Type:[application/json] User-Agent:[Go-http-client/1.1]]
```

client log
```bash
Sending request with 5241880 bytes...
Request Body (first 500 bytes): 
Response Status: 200 OK
Response Body: OK

Sending request with 5243880 bytes...
Request Body (first 500 bytes): 
Response Status: 413 Request Entity Too Large
Response Body: request body too large
```
